name: Yogurt Quest
description:
Yogurt Quest

A little Game boy style game about finding yourself and others cool stuff

Featuring :

  • Yourself
  • A lazy musician
  • A cool mage 
  • and a bunch of easter eggs!

You can play in browser or donwload the ROM ( .gb) and play it offline on an emulator (the rom and the browser version can be different)

Im doing a lot of uploading so come here frequently to see the news!

The game can be played with a mobile browser but it can be very laggy

Browser:

Key pad or WASD : left,right,up,down

z : A (interact,talk)

x : B (close menu, etc...)

Emulator: 

same but you can change the control in your settings

Enjoy!
